Generated Narrative: ValueSet medical-devices-snomed-absent-unknown-eu-hdr

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in Medical Devices (SNOMED CT)
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Absent or Unknown Devices - IPS

name: MedicalDevicesSnomedAbsentUnknownHdrVS
title: Medical Devices - SNOMED CT + Absent/Unknown - IPS
description: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms (SNOMED CT®) that are included in: all descendants of 49062001 \|Device (physical object)\|, plus IPS codes for absent/unknown devices.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
